ratings.comment: Prof. Khan gives great lectures, and he is very clear in which ideas he tries to get across. Everyone at Barnard/Columbia loves his style. This class though is by far the hardest class I have ever takenyou have 200 pg of reading and lengthy writing assignments per week, and close reading and attention are necessary, otherwise you won't pass.

I love Shamus!  I had him for 211 and was excited when I found out he was teaching 357.  Really a great professor, and he's still only a grad student.  Too bad he's leaving for Columbia after this year.  Very knowledgeable about anything Sociology, brings in lots of outside examples to make things clearer.
Best TA at UW. He also lectures, and I've heard he's great at that too. Worth looking for. I learned at ton and it wasn't a ton of hard meaningless work.

The prof blew but Shamus made it worth while. Funny, easy going, but not a total flake. I learned more in 50 minutes of section than I did in 2.5 hours of lecture with Rogers. I wouldn't recommend the class with Rogers, but I would recommend Shamus. Best TA I've had.

AWESOME!!! Best prof I've had at UW. Super-smart but not all snotty. Dude can talk about just about anything and it's brilliant. Take a class with him. You'll learn more and have more fun than other soc classes.
I wish he taught my science classes.  He's a great instructor and is willing to work with you and your circumstances.  Very clear, fun to go to class.  Tries hard.

Shamus was an awesome professor! He is very passionate and enthusiastic about the material he teaches.  He really makes class fun and interesting.  There was a lot of reading assingned, but the grading policy he had was quite favorable.

Shamus is awesome! Everyone should have a chance to study with Shamus!  He truly cares about the students and wants everyone to understand and do well. He makes the material so interesting and is very enthusiastic.  There is a lot of work, but it is totally worth it!
I had Shamus for fall semester and he was awesome.  If you get him to teach you, you're really lucky.

Shamus rules so much.  Its a hard class no matter who you have, but He (yes, He deserves the capital letters) makes it so fun.  He's always willing to do extra work to make you understand and he fights for you against the Prof if needed be.Shamus, ILOVEYO
